Articles.Content: HI! I'm here mainly for tips and tricks on making complex, but successful builds. Getting to the Mun and other bodies comes second for me.

Hello TankD115, and welcome!

We have an abundance of tips and tricks around here. There are threads devoted to most every specialty, whether it be space stations, resource mining bases, SSTO spaceplanes, etc, etc.

When you do want to go to the Mun and other bodies, we have an abundance of tips and tricks about that, too.

Happy landings!

Hi TankD115

Have a good Time with KSP and as much fun as most of us...

...one of us! one of us!
